00028 class ppio;
00029 typedef boost::shared_ptr<ppio> ppio_sptr;

00036 class ppio {
00037  public:
00038   ppio () {}
00039   virtual ~ppio ();
00040 
00041   virtual void write_data (unsigned char v) = 0;
00042   virtual unsigned char read_data () = 0;
00043   virtual void write_control (unsigned char v) = 0;
00044   virtual unsigned char read_control () = 0;
00045   virtual unsigned char read_status () = 0;
00046 
00047   virtual void lock () = 0;
00048   virtual void unlock () = 0;
00049 };
